text: A woman was eagerly looking for something around a lighthouse. Then a passerby passed by her and stopped to gaze at her. He could not help but ask, "Good woman, what have you missed? What are you looking for?" The woman could not stop groaning, and with her voice cut off by the tears, she could respond with a heavy heart: "I am looking for a needle that I lost in my house, but since there is no light there, I have come to find it by this lighthouse". FIN
title: Una insensata búsqueda
author: nan Anónimo
